Finish and close the writing file handle.

Parameters:

Returns:
true on success, otherwise false.

Implemented in CMFileCSV, CMFileICAL, and CMFileVCF.

prepareWriteFile ( $  file  ) 

Open a file handle ready for writing.

Parameters:
$file The file to output to. You will need write permissions and this will remove any file that is previously there with the same name.
Returns:
true on success, otherwise false.
